admin.address_not_valid: ❌ Your address doesn't look valid. 🔍 Examples of valid addresses: ▪️ BTC-bc1qvwgphnuyvqc07vyylz9c0u6kt72mqtutu4e5sn ▪️ LTC-ltc1q73hsjwsudsg7pgpcnyl0nfaym36xxfdq7us4hz ▪️ SOL-9MtEizkbNzPqRe2wrBcyfaXQueBihAsBn4popB7YDVXv ▪️ ETH-0x3be94a238ec30f2848e5a3e18251b14980c77f7f ▪️ BNB-0x3be94a238ec30f2848e5a3e18251b14980c77f7f 🔃 Send another address.
admin.add_items_json_msg:
📄 Send .json file with new items or type "cancel" for cancel. File content example: 
[
  {
    "category": "Category#1",
    "subcategory": "Subcategory#1",
    "price": 50,
    "description": "Mocked description",
    "private_data": "Mocked private data"
  },
  {
    "category": "Category#2",
    "subcategory": "Subcategory#2",
    "price": 100,
    "description": "Mocked description",
    "private_data": "Mocked private data"
  }
]
admin.add_items_private_data: ℹ️ Please send the data that the user will receive after purchase. Note: If you enter one line, you will add one product, if you enter multiple lines, you will add multiple products. 1 line=1 item 10 rows=10 items. If you want to abort adding items enter "cancel".
admin.add_items_txt_msg:
📄 Send .txt file with new items or type "cancel" for cancel. File content example: 
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#1
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#2
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#3
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#4
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#5
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#6
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#7
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#8

admin.credit_management_request_user_entity: 👤 Send the user's telegram id or their telegram username:
admin.credit_management_user_not_found: ⚠️ The user with this data is not found in the database.
admin.crypto_wallet: 🤖 Bot balances ⚖️ BTC Balance: {btc_balance} BTC ⚖️ LTC Balance: {ltc_balance} LTC ⚖️ ETH Balance: {eth_balance} ETH ⚖️ SOL Balance: {sol_balance} SOL ⚖️ BNB Balance: {bnb_balance} BNB
admin.deposits_statistics_msg: 📊 Deposit statistics for the last {timedelta} days. 💸 Total deposits: {deposits_count} 💰 Total BTC deposits for the amount: {btc_amount} BTC 💰 Total LTC deposits for the amount: {ltc_amount} LTC 💰 Total SOL deposits for the amount: {sol_amount} SOL 💰 Total deposits USDT TRC20 in amount: {usdt_trc20_amount} USDT 💰 Total deposits USDT ERC20 in amount: {usdt_erc20_amount} USDT 💰 Total deposits USDC ERC20 in amount: {usdc_erc20_amount} USDC 💰 Total deposits ETH in amount: {eth_amount} ETH 💼 Total cryptocurrency deposits for the amount: {fiat_amount:.2f} {currency_text}
admin.delete_entity_confirmation: ❓ Do you really want to delete the {entity} with name {entity_name}?
admin.new_users_msg: 👥 {users_count} new users in the last {timedelta} days:
admin.notification_new_deposit_id: 💰 New deposit by user with ID {telegram_id} for {currency_sym}{deposit_amount_fiat:.2f} with 💰 {value} {crypto_name}
admin.notification_new_deposit_username: 💰 New deposit by user with username @{username} for {currency_sym}{deposit_amount_fiat:.2f} with 💰 {value} {crypto_name}
admin.notification_purchase_with_tgid: 🛒 A new purchase by user @{username} for the amount of {currency_sym}{total_price:.2f} for the purchase of a {quantity} pcs {category_name} {subcategory_name}.
admin.notification_purchase_with_username: 🛒 A new purchase by user with ID:{telegram_id} for the amount of {currency_sym}{total_price:.2f} for the purchase of a {quantity} pcs {category_name} {subcategory_name}.
admin.sending_result: ✅ Message sent to {counter} out of {len} active users. Total users:{users_count}
admin.successfully_refunded_with_tgid: ✅ Successfully refunded {currency_sym}{total_price:.2f} to user with ID{telegram_id} for purchasing {quantity} {subcategory}
admin.receive_msg_request: 💬 Send a message to the newsletter or "cancel" for cancel:
admin.crypto_withdrawal_info: Withdrawal address: {address} Total to withdraw: {withdrawal_amount} {crypto_name} | {withdrawal_amount_fiat:.2f} {currency_text} Blockchain fee amount: {blockchain_fee_amount} {crypto_name} | {blockchain_fee_fiat:.2f} {currency_text} Service fee amount: {service_fee_amount} {crypto_name} | {service_fee_fiat:.2f} {currency_text} Receiving amount: {receiving_amount} | {receiving_amount_fiat:.2f} | {currency_text}

user.balance_not_refreshed:

Make sure your transaction has at least one confirmation on the blockchain.
user.balance_refreshed_successfully: ✅ The balance has been successfully refreshed!
user.balance_refresh_timeout: ⏳ Please wait and try again later
user.no_cart_items: You have no items in your cart yet
user.faq_string: ⚠️ In our store ignorance of the rules does not exempt you from responsibility. Buying at least one product in the store you automatically agree with all the rules of the store! Rules of the store ❗1.In case of inadequate/offensive behavior the seller has the right to refuse the service! ❗2.A replacement is provided only if the product is invalid. ❗3.Replacement is provided only if there is a video proof. ❗4.30 minutes warranty period. ❗5.The administration is not responsible for any unlawful actions performed by the buyer with the items purchased in the store. ❗6.These terms and conditions may change at any time. ❗7.Money cannot be withdrawn from your balance.
user.no_purchases: ⚠️ You haven't had any purchases yet
user.out_of_stock: ⚠️The following items are sold out or have insufficient stock:
user.refund_notification: ↩️ You have been refunded {currency_sym}{total_price:.2f} for the purchase of {quantity} pieces of {subcategory}
user.top_up_balance_msg: 💵 Deposit to the address the amount you want in {crypto_name} to top up the balance of bot. Payment status: {status} Important A unique BTC/LTC/SOL/ETH addresses is given for each deposit The top up takes place within 5 minutes after the transfer. After a successful balance refresh, you will receive a notification from bot. Your {crypto_name} address {addr}
user.top_up_balance_request_fiat: 💵 Please send the amount you wish to top up balance in {currency_text} or "cancel". ⚠️ Attention! Minimal deposit amount 5 {currency_text}
user.notification_new_deposit:
Your balance was successfully funded by {fiat_amount:.2f} {currency_text}.
Payment ID {payment_id}.
